verses.verse: All the commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117> shall ye observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213>, that ye may live <WH2421>, and multiply <WH7235>, and go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto your fathers <WH1>.

And thou shalt remember <WH2142> all the way <WH1870> which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> led <WH3212> thee these forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness <WH4057>, to humble <WH6031> thee, and to prove <WH5254> thee, to know <WH3045> what was in thine heart <WH3824>, whether thou wouldest keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687>, or no.

And he humbled <WH6031> thee, and suffered thee to hunger <WH7456>, and fed <WH398> thee with manna <WH4478>, which thou knewest <WH3045> not, neither did thy fathers <WH1> know <WH3045>; that he might make thee know <WH3045> that man <WH120> doth not live <WH2421> by bread <WH3899> only <WH905>, but by every word that proceedeth <WH4161> out of the mouth <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> doth man <WH120> live <WH2421>.
Thy raiment <WH8071> waxed not old <WH1086> upon thee, neither did thy foot <WH7272> swell <WH1216>, these forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.
Thou shalt also consider <WH3045> in <WH5973> thine heart <WH3824>, that, as a man <WH376> chasteneth <WH3256> his son <WH1121>, so the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> chasteneth <WH3256> thee.
Therefore thou shalt keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in his ways <WH1870>, and to fear <WH3372> him.

For the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> bringeth <WH935> thee into a good <WH2896> land <WH776>, a land <WH776> of brooks <WH5158> of water <WH4325>, of fountains <WH5869> and depths <WH8415> that spring out <WH3318> of valleys <WH1237> and hills <WH2022>;
A land <WH776> of wheat <WH2406>, and barley <WH8184>, and vines <WH1612>, and fig trees <WH8384>, and pomegranates <WH7416>; a land <WH776> of oil <WH8081> olive <WH2132>, and honey <WH1706>;

A land <WH776> wherein <WH834> thou shalt eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> without <WH3808> scarceness <WH4544>, thou shalt not lack <WH2637> any thing in it; a land <WH776> whose stones <WH68> are iron <WH1270>, and out of whose hills <WH2042> thou mayest dig <WH2672> brass <WH5178>.
When thou hast eaten <WH398> and art full <WH7646>, then thou shalt bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> for the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which he hath given <WH5414> thee.

Beware <WH8104> that thou forget <WH7911> not the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, in not keeping <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687>, and his judgments <WH4941>, and his statutes <WH2708>, which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>:
Lest when thou hast eaten <WH398> and art full <WH7646>, and hast built <WH1129> goodly <WH2896> houses <WH1004>, and dwelt <WH3427> therein;
And when thy herds <WH1241> and thy flocks <WH6629> multiply <WH7235>, and thy silver <WH3701> and thy gold <WH2091> is multiplied <WH7235>, and all that thou hast is multiplied <WH7235>;

Then thine heart <WH3824> be lifted up <WH7311>, and thou forget <WH7911> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, which brought thee forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>;

Who led <WH3212> thee through that great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> wilderness <WH4057>, wherein were fiery <WH8314> serpents <WH5175>, and scorpions <WH6137>, and drought <WH6774>, where there was no water <WH4325>; who brought thee forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> out of the rock <WH6697> of flint <WH2496>;

Who fed <WH398> thee in the wilderness <WH4057> with manna <WH4478>, which thy fathers <WH1> knew <WH3045> not, that he might humble <WH6031> thee, and that he might prove <WH5254> thee, to do thee good <WH3190> at thy latter end <WH319>;
And thou say <WH559> in thine heart <WH3824>, My power <WH3581> and the might <WH6108> of mine hand <WH3027> hath gotten <WH6213> me this wealth <WH2428>.

But thou shalt remember <WH2142> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>: for it is he that giveth <WH5414> thee power <WH3581> to get <WH6213> wealth <WH2428>, that he may establish <WH6965> his covenant <WH1285> which he sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1>, as it is this day <WH3117>.

And it shall be, if thou do at all <WH7911> forget <WH7911> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and walk <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> them, and worship <WH7812> them, I testify <WH5749> against you this day <WH3117> that ye shall surely <WH6> perish <WH6>.

As the nations <WH1471> which the LORD <WH3068> destroyeth <WH6> before your face <WH6440>, so shall ye perish <WH6>; because <WH6118> ye would not be obedient <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
